title: Add apology note to Rose Day unlocked greeting via schedule data

requirements.summary: Append the specified English apology note to the Rose Day (id: "rose-day") unlocked greeting message in the schedule data only, leaving all other days unchanged and without UI conditionals.
acceptanceCriteria: When Rose Day is unlocked, its displayed message includes the added apology note (in English) in addition to the existing Rose Day message.
When any other day (Propose Day through Valentineâ€™s Day) is unlocked, its displayed message remains unchanged and does not include the apology note.

The change is implemented via the schedule data (frontend/src/lib/valentinesSchedule.ts) so the UI (frontend/src/components/ValentineDayCard.tsx) renders it automatically without additional conditional UI logic.

file_operations.description: Update only the 'rose-day' schedule item's message string to include an additional apology note in English expressing exactly: "sorry for all the mistakes I have done before and I'll try to improve myself" (e.g., appended with line breaks), without modifying any other day's message, without changing schedule ordering, and without changing any unlockDate/date-locking logic.
